sources.title: Deep Sea Doodle (1960)
sources.description: Heckle and Jeckle run a dilapidated old scow that they pass off a sport fishing boat to unsuspecting Dimwit. When things start falling apart, the dopey dog chases the merry birds around the tub until it sinks. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/deep-sea-doodle-1960/

metadata.Plot: Heckle and Jeckle run a dilapidated old scow that they pass off a sport fishing boat to unsuspecting Dimwit. When things start falling apart, The dopey dog chases the merry birds around the tub until it sinks.
